ygData.subject: Re: faction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes. I do expect this to disappear, since a few PC festivals and other dueling events have already been cancelled, since the participants definitively do
ygData.messageBody:
According to Tom Bratina:
> update... i just read a post on stratics that says u can lose faction on all
> of the servers by killing other PC's (ie. duels). it says after 5-7 PC
> kills, their faction standing went from indifferent to dubious. A few more,
> and they will be KOS (threatingly is after dubious, and they will attack if
> conned threatingly).

Yes. I do expect this to disappear, since a few PC festivals and other dueling
events have already been cancelled, since the participants definitively do
*not* want faction hits, and I can understand this. Verant will not implement
something that would hamper socialisation.

--
